Mutate a cell seg table to have a Phenotype column with the desired phenotypes.

Source: R/select_rows.R
make_phenotype_column.Rd

Note: Cells that satisfy multiple phenotype definitions will appear multiple times in the result.

make_phenotype_column(csd, phenotypes = NULL)

Arguments

csd

A cell seg table.

phenotypes

A named vector or list of phenotype rules. If NULL, use unique_phenotypes(csd).

Value

A new cell seg table

Contents

Developed by Kent S Johnson.
